description: Need a taxi? Just tap a button. Taxi Magic makes it that simple, for free.  Taxi Magic connects your Palm directly with taxi dispatch systems to let you book taxis instantly, without making a phone call! You get notified via text message when your taxi is on its way.  Integrated booking available in over 25 major cities (tap to call options in >4000 US and Canadian cities):  Atlanta | Austin | Baltimore | Boston | Charlotte | Chicago | Dallas | Denver | Kansas City | Los Angeles | Minneapolis | Nashville | Orange Co. | Pittsburgh | Phoenix | Portland | Sacramento | San Antonio | San Diego | San Francisco | San Jose/Silicon Valley | Seattle | St. Louis | Washington DC Area   Whether traveling to a new city or simply on the go at home, Taxi Magic is the essential application for booking taxis.
